alert.note: Alert for Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 4:21AM PDT until March 30 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet. Up to 12 inches on the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
